txt.en: The Stonedeans are a rocky, inhospitable land of crags and broken stones, from which the Rohirrim mine metal for weapons and other goods. This Riding is that most similar to Dunland in the west, and intermarriage among Rohirrim and Dunlendish folk is common.\n\nWoodhurst is the largest town in the Stonedeans, but Brockbridge to the south is of strategic importance.
